author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Canopy Growth Announces Application To List On The NYSE
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Canopy Growth Corp:
* CANOPY GROWTH ANNOUNCES APPLICATION TO LIST ON THE NYSE * CANOPY GROWTH CORP - CURRENTLY ANTICIPATES SHARES WILL BEGIN TRADING ON NYSE BEFORE END OF MAY 2018
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - CANOPY GROWTH’S SHARES WILL TRADE ON NYSE UNDER TICKER SYMBOL “CGC”
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - CO’S SHARES WILL CONTINUE TO TRADE ON TSX UNDER TICKER SYMBOL “WEED” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
